Variety of choice experiments made of two incomparable medicines elixir febrifugium martis, and salt of lymons. : Shewing their vertues, use and operations : being the peculiar secrets and acquisitions of the author. / Moses Stringer ... M. S. (Moses Stringer)
16 p.
Printed by J. Wilkins, near Fleet street, for the author, London : 1700.
Imperfect: pages are cropped with slight loss of print. Reproduction of original in: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru/National Library of Wales.
